mapper.select: SELECT bc.categoryName AS s_name, SUM(p2.mult) AS s_num FROM big_category bc, category c, (SELECT category2 AS categoryNum, (od.ordered_cnt * p.product_price) AS mult FROM order_detail od, product p WHERE od.product_id = p.product_id) AS p2 WHERE bc.categoryNum = c.bigCategoryNum AND c.categoryNum = p2.categoryNum GROUP BY s_name ORDER BY s_num desc
select IFNULL(sum(o.total_price), 0) from order1 o where date_format(o.order_date, "%Y-%m-%d") = curdate()

SELECT bc.categoryName AS s_name, SUM(p2.mult) AS s_num FROM big_category bc, category c, (SELECT category2 AS categoryNum, (od.ordered_cnt * p.product_price) AS mult FROM order_detail od, product p, order1 o WHERE od.product_id = p.product_id and date_format(o.order_date, "%Y-%m-%d")= date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d')) AS p2 WHERE bc.categoryNum = c.bigCategoryNum AND c.categoryNum = p2.categoryNum GROUP BY s_name ORDER BY s_num desc

SELECT DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m') AS s_name, SUM(od.ordered_cnt * p.product_price) AS s_num FROM order_detail od, product p, order1 o WHERE od.product_id = p.product_id AND od.order_id = o.order_id AND DATE_FORMAT(o.order_date, '%Y-%m') BETWEEN '2023-02' AND '2023-05' GROUP BY s_name ORDER BY s_name asc
